title: (x) Is this a font type of custom? / 'Uncrate' - Clarendon Extra Wide {Riccardo}
content:
Hi all,

I am wondering if a typography expert may know the answer to this.

Is the logo for uncrate ( [http://www.uncrate.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621165024/http:/www.uncrate.com/ "http://www.uncrate.com/")) a font that is available or is it custom?

Thank you in advance,

Aaron
author: resolva
